info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 8:37AM CDT until April 28 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas...
Neches River Near Diboll affecting Tyler, Houston, Angelina, Trinity and Polk Counties.
For the Neches River...including Lake Palestine, Neches, Alto, Diboll, Rockland...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Neches River near Diboll.
* WHEN...From Saturday morning to Monday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs. Expect flooded boat ramps and trails.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The Neches River south of Diboll is expected to rise above the 12 foot flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 12.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 04/04/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1100 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO MONDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Angelina, TX; Houston, TX; Polk, TX; Trinity, TX; Tyler, TX
